text: May this not blemish my families honour.
You are lucky not to meet Sharpclaws talons.
I suppose even nobles must deal with undesirables like yourself.
Gold or be my latest conquest for glory!
My family reigns back to the first Phoenix King and here I am dealing with the likes of you.
I do this for my people, not myself.
You’d be wise to accept, if not to end up like the prisoners from the Emerald Hills.
Sharpclaw makes more sense than your foolish drivel.
I have not fought so many battles, to fold to the likes of you in matters of diplomacy.
Leave my sight before I have Sharpclaw feed on your innards.
Speak, before I command Sharpclaw to scratch out your eyes.
Speak quickly and with purpose, I have little time for niceties.
I’d sooner meet you on the battlefield.
The Citadel of Dusk accepts with the warmest regards.
It would be our honour to accept these terms.
We rid the seas of all scourges for everyone’s betterment.
This will only further our glory.
The Citadel of Dusk looks after its friends.
Come friend, what say you to my fair offer?
We graciously must refuse.
The Capes attentions lie elsewhere for now, but perhaps in time we can revisit this.
On my families honour, we would accept if we could.
Welcome friend, how can the Asur of the Dusk help you.
Come lets find some shade and we can discuss matters.
Caladris told me of your arrival, it is good to see such friends in dark times.
The Capes accepts your proposal.
As Governor General, I accept your offer.
May this forge our friendship ever closer.
The Citadel of Dusk will not forget your generosity this day.
You have my families thanks, we will ensure you are repaid in kind.
Let us break out the wine, I have a bottle of particularly good vintage.
It is good to see power brokered not only from battle.
The Citadel of Dusk rejoices!
You have made a mistake, let’s hope it doesn’t lead to your demise.
Sharpclaw is out hunting, safe travels to your party.
The Citadel of Dusk see this for what it is, treachery.
Brave, to reject one who has so many victories as myself.
Would you really see the Citadel crumble?
This displease the court of the Citadel of Dusk.
You and your kind will be burnt alive with no ceremony.
Have you heard of Skreet Verminkin? No. That is because I slayed him and you will suffer the same inmagnanimous fate.
You clearly do not know the Stormrider name, that will be remedied.
This treaty was a blight on my families name.
This no longer benefits the Citadel of Dusk.
I don’t want to be associated with the likes of you.
The Citadel of Dusk asks for your aid in battle.
My feats speak for themselves, Blood Island, Emerald Hills, Stormkeep, need I go on?
We must secure the sea lanes, if we are all to prosper.
Think of it as a fee, for the safe shipping lanes you use.
What say you to Stormrider, Prince and Captain.
The Capes hope you see the benefit of this offer.
I make this offer, as ruler of the Citadel of Dusk.
With respect the Citadel of Dusk declines.
Caladris believes there is an ulterior motive in your proposal.
The Capes can not agree to these terms.
We must work together, should we gain glory.
Caladris has studied the ancient texts, they foretell of our doom, we must join forces now!
The Citadel of Dusk has long stood, will you help keep it so.
There is no glory in this.
The Citadel has stood for over a thousand years, would you really see it crumble?
Shame, Sharpclaw was developing a taste for your so called warriors.
Sharpclaw hungers.
Victory will be assured and we will revel in glory.
I continue my families great tradition and uphold their name.
Accept and it will be sent in haste on the Dragonship Ingranion.
Caladris advocates that we support you.
The Citadel of Dusk prospers, and we will see you too.
Welcome to the mighty court of the Citadel of Dusk
I am the Governor General of the Capes, welcome.
How can the Citadel of Dusk help?
Sharpclaw still hungers.
There is still glory to be had.
This would be a mere footnote and I mean to make it my greatest feat, ending in your demise.
The sea lanes would be rampant with piracy and the Citadel would crumble under your stewardship.
I did not emerge victor in Blood Island, Emerald Hills, Stormkeep and many more, to serve under you.
Now is not the time, the Citadel of Dusk has important work, and our attentions can not be divided.
Look to your skies, for in time you will see me atop Sharpclaw ahead of the glittering host.
For the glory of my people, for glory of my name I shall see you destroyed.
This will be greater than my campaign at the Island of Blood.
